cells.text: All the warrants (note 12(c)) and options (note 12(d)) are potentially dilutive in the period ended June 30, 2011, but

cells.text: excluded from the calculation of diluted earnings per share are those for which the exercise price exceeds the average

cells.text: market price. For the year ended June 30, 2010, warrants (note 12(c)) and options (note 12(d)), which are potentially
cells.text_vi: Giá thị trường. Cho năm kết thúc vào ngày 30 tháng 6 năm 2010, bảo đảm (ghi chú 12 (c)) và các tùy chọn (chú thích 12 (d)), có khả năng

cells.text: dilutive, are excluded from the calculation of diluted loss per share as their impact would be anti-dilutive.
cells.text_vi: MiLITY, được loại trừ khỏi việc tính toán tổn thất pha loãng trên mỗi cổ phiếu vì tác động của chúng sẽ chống ẩm.

cells.text: Deferred costs are comprised of the following:
cells.text_vi: Chi phí hoãn lại bao gồm những điều sau đây:

cells.text: In May 2011, the Company, through its wholly owned subsidiary Monument Mengapur Sdn. Bhd. (formerly “Orifer

cells.text: Asia Sdn. Bhd.”) in Malaysia, has entered into a binding Memorandum of Understanding (the “MOU”) with Malaco

cells.text: and reserve estimates, signing of a Definitive Sale and Purchase Agreement, financing, board and regulatory

cells.text: approvals and other conditions. Upon completion of the acquisition, Monument would hold a 70% pre-financing
